attributes.action: Close the construction sites to protect people from COVID-19!
attributes.additional_details: To slow the spread of COVID-19. Construction workers have families to take care of.
attributes.background:
‘ I walked past two construction sites today with absolutely no social distancing, people lighting each other's fags, hanging out in Portakabins. These builders' employers are running deathtraps.’ 

It is impossible to maintain social distancing travelling to work to make it on time!
